attributes.action: Reinstate National Service in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to raise support to reinstate National Service in the United Kingdom.

National Service was in operation from after World War Two until 1960 where it gave the unemployed (18 - 51years old) an oppertunity to be called up to Military Service.  This installed discipline and respect, of which something that is severely lacking in todays society.  So please show support fo this and sign the petition.
